body: it's shit if ntr has deud ex machina

@RevyTwoHand The translation was just recently done, in short it's a world where everyone is either a low class citizen or a high class one, at first it's implied people are divided because of genetics though at the end it becomes apparent it's just bull. Anyhow all LC males are banned from having sex with any woman, while any LC woman must have sex with a HC male while they are ovulating till they get pregnant. So in this case childhood sweethearts are torn apart since she has to have sex with the HC dude while her LC sweetheart can never have sex with her cause of the law. Their also all wearing collars and it's implied someone who earlier tried to stop it most likely had his head blow up. So yeah in short dystopian future where the rich just does whatever they want.
From what I could glean. Seem to have a interesting story.
